result.reason: User requested option to control full connection name visibility on tabs.
result.approach: Add a new setting to OptionsTabsPanelsPage to control tab text display. Modify ConnectionWindow.AddConnectionTab to use this setting when formatting the tab text. Add a corresponding checkbox to the TabsPanelsPage in FrmOptions.

attempts.raw_output:
A feature request has been submitted to enable users to toggle the display of full connection names on tabs.

```json
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "User requested option to control full connection name visibility on tabs.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": [

"mRemoteNG/Properties/OptionsTabsPanelsPage.Designer.cs",

"mRemoteNG/UI/Window/ConnectionWindow.cs"
],
"approach": "Add a new setting to OptionsTabsPanelsPage to control tab text display. Modify ConnectionWindow.AddConnectionTab to use this setting when formatting the tab text. Add a corresponding checkbox to the TabsPanelsPage in FrmOptions."
}
```
